UGH. My dad's best friend added me as a friend on FB. Yeah, sure, let's be friends so you can see lot of unflattering pics of me drunk.

ugh, I'm start to notice random ants in my apt. This is NOT good.

Watching Yo Gabba Gabba with my niece. She's mesmerized. Mission accomplished.
